name: Vishal Scientific
overview:
Vishal Scientific & Surgical Udyog (VSSU) (An ISO 9001:2008 certified company) was established in 1982 and started as a small business engaged in the Manufacturing, Supplying and Exporting of Medical, Hospital, Pathological, Surgical, Laboratory, Scientific & Diagnostics and many other types of Glassware products as per customer’s specifications. The demand for our products has been constantly rising. Under the leadership of Mr. Udaiveer Singh, who have wide experience and great practical knowledge of their products since more than 35 years.

Quality Assurance: We gives prime importance to the quality of our Scientific Equipment & Instrument and hence, we are following a well defined quality policy. To serve our clients in best possible manner, we nurture a separate quality control department, which is duly taken care of by our quality inspectors.

Our Infrastructure: Our modern infrastructural setup is equipped with machinery and equipment. The unit is spread across a wide area and has large installation capacity. We have further divided our unit into manufacturing, quality testing and development wings. The segmentation of the unit helps in easy making of bulk consignments with utmost proficiency.

Packaging & Delivery: We understand and believe that the definition of quality has to encompass the complete product delivery system and not just product manufacturing. Therefore, instead of transferring the onus of special export packaging & logistics to our clients, we assist them through our team at every step.

Why Us ?: We have been able to create an outstanding position in the industry. Following are some of the factors which have set us apart from our competitors: Wide range of quality products Team of talented professionals Wide distribution network Competitive market price Ethical business practice
